name: RadicalMailBox and PepperBoi | incomplete demo
description:
Pepperboi and RadicalMailbox were teleported to a platformer created by Proliver, helps Pepperboi and RadicalMailbox get out of that game in Full HD 4K

""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

this is a incomplete demo

PepperBoi:

    press "A" to go left

    press "D" to go Right

    press "W" to jump

RadicalMailBox:

    press "Left" to go left

    press "Right" to go Right

    press "Up" to jump

Others:

    press "ESC" to go to the previous scene

    press "TAB" to open the pause menu

    press "Z" to have the pepperboi camera

    press "X" to have the radicalmailbox camera

    press "E" to enter a door
